explains: v. 调停，斡旋；影响……的发生，使……可能发生；促成（协议），找到……的解决办法；引起，形成；传递，传达；连接，沟通；处于中间地位
adj. 间接的；居间的，介于中间的

sentences.en: The Secretary-General was asked to mediate in the dispute.
sentences.cn: 有人请秘书长来调解这次纷争。

sentences.en: An independent body was brought in to mediate between staff and management.
sentences.cn: 由一个独立机构介入，在劳资之间进行调解。

sentences.en: Schools are not just a microcosm of society; they mediate it too.
sentences.cn: 学校不仅仅是社会的缩影；它们也会调解。
